title: Add drift-triggered evaluation + calibration pipeline for Sales_Accelerator models

sections.text: Create an offline job that, when drift is flagged (via the existing drift signals ticket), automatically snapshots recent data by segment and runs a standardized evaluation for forecasting, best-next-action, and risk alert models. The job should compute calibration metrics (e.g., reliability curves / Brier score) and key business KPIs deltas vs the currently deployed model to confirm true performance degradation. Store results with model/version + timeframe metadata so subsequent retraining/recalibration tickets can use a consistent baseline.
